subSubSection.paragraph: The species was reported as a parasitoid of wood-boring Coleoptera ( Cerambycidae , Curculionidae and Scolytidae ) in Fagaceae and Rosaceae .
Northern, central, eastern and southern Europe incl. United Kingdom; Germany: Baden-Wuerttemberg , Hessen, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, Rheinland-Pfalz
Newly-recorded genus and species in Germany. Images: Fig. 30
